protein.specific_function: May be involved in redox reactions associated with the formation of disulfide bonds. May contribute to the quality control of protein folding in the endoplasmic reticulum

reference.reference_text: Gladyshev VN, Jeang KT, Wootton JC, Hatfield DL: A new human selenium-containing protein. Purification, characterization, and cDNA sequence. J Biol Chem. 1998 Apr 10;273(15):8910-5.
